timeline.message: Switching file to use logger instead of system.out
Moving initialize to a shared method
Cleaning up a bunch of the gridbags to instead just modify the x and y of a single one
Buttons are now created in a method
Moving internal class to the bottom of the file
Fixing issues in unit selector - NPE
Modernizing Select Mech to Select Unit
Applying initial changes for switching to using a MekHQ specific variant
Adding the MekHQ localization here so that the unit selectors are all localized in the same place
Making modifications to the UnitSelector classes in MegaMek as part of adding the MekHQ unit selector
Trying to figure out unit tech level bug
Doing a bit of reformatting in AbstractUnitSelector
Fixed the unit selector not updating with regards to tech level
Switching to using an abstract method to update any options
Fixing user preferences to work properly for MegaMek, although we need to fix the default sorting ordeR

timeline.bodyText: Why is this replaced here and not below where the right bracket is replaced?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText:
Yep, inherited code... but I'm not sure.
I've reworked it so that it just sends the guiPreferences to updateTypeCombo and if needed it gets the rules and does the replacements, as that's just a better way to handle it.
replies.author: Windchild292
